organizations.title: Technical Operator at Final Board Meeting 2025
organizations.description: Managed live hybrid meeting systems and handled technical coordination to ensured smooth execution of final organizational deliberations.

organizations.title: Public Relations, Publication, and Documentation division at New Member Orientation 2024
organizations.description: Managed event communications, visual publications, and documentation, ensuring clear information and consistent public-facing materials throughout the Robotic Club orientation program.

organizations.title: Registration Division at Eletronic Robotic Competition 2024
organizations.description: Handled participant registration, data verification, and on-site coordination at over 100 candidates to ensure accurate records and smooth event flow during the competition.

organizations.title: Moderator at PKKMB Ilmu Komputer 2024
organizations.description: Moderated orientation sessions by guiding discussions, managing time, and maintaining clear communication between speakers and participants at PKKMB Ilmu Komputer 2024.

organizations.title: Technical Operator at Technical Meeting Robotic Club UNJ 2024
organizations.description: Managed presentations and handled technical coordination of the presentations by each groups and divisions in Robotic Club UNJ 2024.
